args.natural_language_statement: Translate to Lean4: Let m^* be the outer measure on R^d. Suppose R_1,...,R_m are pairwise disjoint open rectangles in R^d (each R_i = Π_{j=1}^d (a_{i,j}, b_{i,j})). Show m^*(⋃_{i=1}^m R_i) = ∑_{i=1}^m m^*(R_i). Produce a theorem statement in Mathlib style (no proof), defining an is_open_rectangle predicate as: is_open_rectangle S := ∃ a b : Fin d → ℝ, S = Set.pi Set.univ (fun i => Ioo (a i) (b i)). Use measure_theory.outer_measure for m^*. End the statement with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Set Function Filter
open scoped NNReal Topology ENNReal

/-- Let m^* be the outer measure on R^d. Suppose R_1,...,R_m are pairwise disjoint open rectangles in R^d (each R_i = Π_{j=1}^d (a_{i,j}, b_{i,j})). Show m^*(⋃_{i=1}^m R_i) = ∑_{i=1}^m m^*(R_i). Produce a theorem statement in Mathlib style (no proof), defining an is_open_rectangle predicate as: is_open_rectangle S := ∃ a b : Fin d → ℝ, S = Set.pi Set.univ (fun i => Ioo (a i) (b i)).

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- A set S in R^d is an open rectangle if there exist lower and upper bounds a,b : Fin d → ℝ
    such that S = ∏_{i} (a i, b i). -/
def IsOpenRectangle {d : ℕ} (S : Set (Fin d → ℝ)) : Prop :=
  ∃ (a b : Fin d → ℝ), S = Set.pi Set.univ fun i => Ioo (a i) (b i)

/-- Let μ_star be an outer measure on R^d. Suppose R_i (i : Fin m) are pairwise disjoint open
    rectangles. Then the outer measure of the union equals the sum of the outer measures. -/
theorem outer_measure_union_of_pairwise_disjoint_open_rectangles {d : ℕ} {m_count : ℕ}
  (μ_star : measure_theory.outer_measure (Fin d → ℝ)) (R : Fin m_count → Set (Fin d → ℝ))
  (h_rect : ∀ i, IsOpenRectangle (R i))
  (h_disj : Pairwise fun i j => Disjoint (R i) (R j)) :
  μ_star (⋃ i, R i) = ∑ i : Fin m_count, μ_star (R i) := by sorry
